Long before the , framers of the Kyo prefecture were menaced by marauding pirates in order to defend themselves, the farmer folk took up kama, lacking actual weapons. Hideo was the creator of these kama that ensured the farmers survival. Despite being the architect of the farmers survival, eventually, Hideo fell out of favor and died in poverty, spending a fortune on Hideos kama and arming the locals.
